where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( apo <* approval_person_organization | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( u <* USEDIN ( apo , schema_name + '.APPLIED_DATE_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) | ( u.role.name = 'sign off' ) ) ) + SIZEOF ( QUERY ( u <* USEDIN ( apo , schema_name + '.APPLIED_DATE_AND_TIME_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) | ( u.role.name = 'sign off' ) ) ) ) <>1 ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( a <* approval | SIZEOF(USEDIN( a, schema_name + '.APPROVAL_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_APPROVAL' )) = 0 )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( d <* derived_unit | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( d , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( d <* document_usage_role | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( d , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( m <* measure_with_unit | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( m , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( n <* named_unit | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( n , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( p <* precision_qualifier | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( p , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( p <* product_definition_context_role | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( p , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( s <* standard_uncertainty | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( s , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( t <* time_interval_role | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( t , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( t <* type_qualifier | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( t , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( u <* uncertainty_qualifier | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( u , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( g <* geometric_representation_context | NOT ((g.coordinate_space_dimension =2 ) OR (g.coordinate_space_dimension =3 )))) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( eo <* event_occurrence | ( SIZEOF (USEDIN ( eo, schema_name + '.RELATIVE_EVENT_OCCURRENCE.BASE_EVENT' ) ) =0 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( eo , schema_name + '.EVENT_OCCURRENCE_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_EVENT_OCCURRENCE' ) ) =0 )) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( guac <* global_unit_assigned_context | SIZEOF ( guac. units ) <2 ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( guac <* global_unit_assigned_context | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( x <* guac. units | schema_name + '.LENGTH_UNIT' IN TYPEOF ( x ) ) ) <>1 ) OR ( SIZEOF(QUERY( x <* guac. units | schema_name + '.PLANE_ANGLE_UNIT' IN TYPEOF(x))) <>1 ))) =0

rule.name: externally_defined_class_with_known_source_requirement

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( edc <* known_sourced_classes | (SIZEOF ( QUERY ( aoa <* USEDIN ( edc , schema_name + '.APPLIED_ORGANIZATION_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) | aoa.role.name = 'class supplier' )) = 0 ))) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( ks <* known_source | (ks.name <> 'ISO 13584 library') )) = 0

rule.name: plib_class_reference_requires_version

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( edc <* known_sourced_classes | (SIZEOF( QUERY( aei <* USEDIN(edc,schema_name + '.APPLIED_EXTERNAL_IDENTIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS') | aei.role.name = 'version' )) <> 1) )) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( edc <* known_sourced_classes | (SIZEOF( QUERY( aei <* USEDIN(edc,schema_name + '.APPLIED_IDENTIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS') | aei.role.name = 'version' )) > 0) )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( p <* person | SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( p ,schema_name + '.PERSON_AND_ORGANIZATION.THE_PERSON' )) = 0 )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( eo <* applied_event_occurrence_assignment| ( eo\event_occurrence_assignment.role.name ='event context' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( eo.items ) >1 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( aopa <* applied_organizational_project_assignment | ( aopa.role.name = 'affecting project' ) AND NOT item_correlation( aopa. items , ['PRODUCT_CONCEPT', 'PRODUCT', 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION', 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_FORMATION'] ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( aopa <* applied_organizational_project_assignment | ( aopa.role.name = 'work program' ) AND NOT item_correlation (aopa.items , ['EXECUTED_ACTION'] ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( a <* approval | SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( a , schema_name + '.APPROVAL_DATE_TIME.DATED_APPROVAL' ) ) >2 ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( adt <* approval_date_time | ( NOT EXISTS( adt.role ) ) OR ( NOT ( adt.role.name IN ['actual' , 'planned'] ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( a <* approval | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( adt <* USEDIN ( a , schema_name + '.APPROVAL_DATE_TIME.DATED_APPROVAL' ) | adt.role.name ='actual' ) ) >1 ) ) =0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( a <* approval | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( adt <* USEDIN ( a , schema_name + '.APPROVAL_DATE_TIME.DATED_APPROVAL' ) | adt.role.name ='planned' ) ) >1 ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* approval_status | NOT at_most_one_class_system(ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( c <* class | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( aca <* USEDIN ( c , schema_name + '.CLASSIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_CLASS' ) | ( ( aca.role.name ='class system membership' ) AND ( schema_name + '.APPLIED_CLASSIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT' IN TYPEOF ( aca ) ) ) ) ) >1 ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* descriptive_representation_item | NOT at_most_one_class_system(ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* document_type | NOT at_most_one_class_system(ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pe <* planar_extent | ( pe\representation_item.name = 'size format' ) AND NOT at_most_one_class_system(ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* security_classification_level | NOT at_most_one_class_system(ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( cd <* configuration_design | ( cd. name ='physical instance basis' ) AND ( NOT (schema_name + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF ( cd.design ) ) OR ( cd. design\product_definition.frame_of_reference.name<> 'physical occurrence' ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( cd <* configuration_design | ( cd. name ='physical instance basis' ) AND ( NOT (schema_name + '.PRODUCT_IDENTIFICATION' IN TYPEOF (cd.configuration ) ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(adr <* applied_date_assignment | (adr.role.name = 'actual end') AND (NOT item_correlation (adr.items, ['ORGANIZATIONAL_PROJECT', 'EFFECTIVITY'])) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(adr <* applied_document_reference | (SELF.role.name = 'general tolerance definition') AND (NOT item_correlation (SELF.items, ['REPRESENTATION'])) ))=0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(adr <* applied_document_reference | NOT ((SELF.role.name = 'general tolerance definition') OR item_correlation (SELF.items, ['APPROVAL','CERTIFICATION','CLASS', 'CLASS_SYSTEM','CONFIGURATION_DESIGN', 'CONFIGURATION_ITEM','CONTRACT', 'GENERAL_PROPERTY','MATERIAL_DESIGNATION', 'ORGANIZATION','ORGANIZATIONAL_PROJECT', 'PERSON','PRODUCT_CONCEPT', 'PRODUCT_CONCEPT_FEATURE', 'PRODUCT_CONCEPT_FEATURE_CATEGORY', 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION','PRODUCT_DEFINITION_FORMATION', 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_FORMATION_RELATIONSHIP','PRODUCT_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP', 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_SUBSTITUTE','PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY', 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION', 'REPRESENTATION', 'SECURITY_CLASSIFICATION','SHAPE_ASPECT', 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP'])) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( aea <* applied_effectivity_assignment | ((SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* aea.items | (schema_name + '.PRODUCT_CONCEPT_FEATURE_CATEGORY_USAGE' IN TYPEOF(i)) )) > 0) AND ((SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* aea.items | (schema_name + '.PRODUCT_CONCEPT_FEATURE_CATEGORY_USAGE' IN TYPEOF(i)) )) <> SIZEOF(aea.items)) OR (SIZEOF(TYPEOF(aea.assigned_effectivity) * [schema_name + '.TIME_INTERVAL_BASED_EFFECTIVITY', schema_name + '.DATED_EFFECTIVITY', schema_name + '.SERIAL_NUMBERED_EFFECTIVITY', schema_name + '.LOT_EFFECTIVITY', schema_name + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_EFFECTIVITY']) > 0) OR (aea.assigned_effectivity.id <> 'class usage') OR (SIZEOF( QUERY ( cueca <* USEDIN(aea,schema_name + '.EFFECTIVITY_CONTEXT_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_EFFECTIVITY_ASSIGNMENT') | schema_name + '.CLASS_USAGE_EFFECTIVITY_CONTEXT_ASSIGNMENT' IN TYPEOF (cueca ) )) = 0)) ))) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( er <* effectivity_relationship | ( SIZEOF ( [schema_name + '.LOT_EFFECTIVITY' , schema_name + '.SERIAL_NUMBERED_EFFECTIVITY' , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_EFFECTIVITY']*TYPEOF( er.relating_effectivity ) ) >0 ) OR ( SIZEOF ( [schema_name + '.LOT_EFFECTIVITY' , schema_name + '.SERIAL_NUMBERED_EFFECTIVITY' , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_EFFECTIVITY']*TYPEOF( er.related_effectivity ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

rule.name: restrict_effectivity_usage

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( e <* other_effectivities | ( (SIZEOF( QUERY( er <* USEDIN(e,schema_name + '.EFFECTIVITY_RELATIONSHIP.' + 'RELATED_EFFECTIVITY') | er.name = 'inheritance' )) = 0) OR ((e.id = 'configuration validity') AND (SIZEOF( QUERY ( cea <* USEDIN(e,schema_name + '.EFFECTIVITY_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_EFFECTIVITY') | schema_name + '.CONFIGURED_EFFECTIVITY_ASSIGNMENT' IN TYPEOF ( cea) ) ) = 0)) OR ((e.id = 'class usage') AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( aea <* USEDIN(e,schema_name + '.EFFECTIVITY_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_EFFECTIVITY') | (schema_name + '.APPLIED_EFFECTIVITY_ASSIGNMENT' IN TYPEOF ( aea ) ) AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* aea.items | schema_name + '.PRODUCT_CONCEPT_FEATURE_CATEGORY_USAGE' IN TYPEOF(i) )) > 0) )) = 0))) )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( edir <* externally_defined_item_relationship | ( edir. name = 'name scope' ) AND ( NOT ( schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_GENERAL_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF ( edir.relating_item ) ) OR NOT ( schema_name + '.KNOWN_SOURCE' IN TYPEOF ( edir. relating_item.source ) ) OR NOT ( schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_CLASS' IN TYPEOF ( edir. related_item ) ) OR NOT (schema_name + '.KNOWN_SOURCE' IN TYPEOF ( edir.related_item.source ) ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(aeia <* applied_external_identification_assignment | (aeia.role.name = 'alternative document id and location') AND (NOT item_correlation (aeia.items, ['DOCUMENT_FILE']))))=0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(aeia <* applied_external_identification_assignment | (aeia.role.name = 'version') AND (NOT item_correlation (aeia.items, ['EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_CLASS', 'EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_GENERAL_PROPERTY'])) ))=0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(aeia <* applied_group_assignment | (SELF.role.name = 'group membership') AND (NOT item_correlation (SELF.items, ['GEOMETRIC_REPRESENTATION_ITEM', 'SHAPE_ASPECT'])) ))=0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(aeia <* applied_group_assignment |(SELF.role.name = 'group membership')) AND (NOT ((SIZEOF(SELF.items) = SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* SELF.items | schema_name + '.GEOMETRIC_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(i)))) OR (SIZEOF(SELF.items) = SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* SELF.items | schema_name + '.SHAPE_ASPECT' IN TYPEOF(i)))))) ))=0

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ks <* known_source | ( ks.name<>'ISO 13584 library' ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(aoa <* applied_organization_assignment | (aoa.role.name = 'organization in contract') AND (NOT item_correlation (aoa.items, ['CONTRACT'])) ))= 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(aoa <* applied_organization_assignment | (aoa.role.name = 'signing for contract') AND (NOT item_correlation (aoa.items, ['APPLIED_ORGANIZATION_ASSIGNMENT'])) ))= 0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(aoa <* applied_organization_assignment | (aoa.role.name = 'validity context') AND (NOT item_correlation (aoa.items, ['PROPERTY_DEFINITION'])) ))= 0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(aoa <* applied_organization_assignment | (aoa.role.name = 'alias scope') AND (NOT item_correlation (aoa.items, ['APPLIED_IDENTIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT'])) ))= 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(aoa <* applied_person_and_organization_assignment | (SELF.role.name = 'signing for contract') AND (NOT item_correlation (SELF.items, ['APPLIED_ORGANIZATION_ASSIGNMENT'])) ))= 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* product_definition_relationship | ( pdr.name = 'tool part relationship' ) AND ( ( SIZEOF (QUERY ( prpc <* USEDIN ( pdr.relating_product_definition.formation.of_product , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS' ) | prpc.name ='tool') ) <1 ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY (prpc <* USEDIN ( pdr. related_product_definition.formation.of_product , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS') | prpc.name ='part') ) <1 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(p <* product | SIZEOF(QUERY(prpc <* USEDIN(p, schema_name + '.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS') | prpc.name IN ['part','document','functionality', 'conceptual product','alternative solution','requirement', 'physically realized product','tool','raw material'] ) ) <> 1 )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY (pd <* product_definition | (SIZEOF (QUERY ( propd <* USEDIN ( pd, schema_name + '.PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY (gpa <* USEDIN ( propd , schema_name + '.GENERAL_PROPERTY_ASSOCIATION.DERIVED_DEFINITION' )| schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_GENERAL_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF (gpa.base_definition ) ) ) > 0 ) ) > 0 ) AND ( SIZEOF (QUERY ( pdca <* USEDIN ( pd, schema_name + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_CONTEXT_ASSOCIATION.DEFINITION' )| (pdca.frame_of_reference.name = 'external') AND (pdca.role.name = 'external') ) ) = 0 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* product_definition | ( pd.frame_of_reference.name = 'functional definition' ) AND (SIZEOF ( QUERY ( prpc <* USEDIN ( pd. formation.of_product, schema_name + '.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS' ) | prpc.name ='functionality' ) ) =0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* product_definition | ( pd.frame_of_reference.name = 'conceptual definition' ) AND (SIZEOF ( QUERY ( prpc <* USEDIN ( pd. formation.of_product, schema_name + '.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS') | prpc.name = 'conceptual product' ) ) =0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR7
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* product_definition | ( pd.frame_of_reference.name IN ['physical document definition', 'digital document definition', 'physical model_occurrence'] ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( prpc <* USEDIN ( pd.formation.of_product , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS' ) | prpc.name ='document' ) ) =0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pds <* product_definition_substitute | (SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( pds , schema_name + '.APPLIED_EFFECTIVITY_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) ) =0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pds <* product_definition_substitute | pds.substitute_definition.frame_of_reference.name <> 'part occurrence' ) ) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pds <* product_definition_substitute | ( ( schema_name + '.ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_USAGE' IN TYPEOF ( pds.context_relationship ) ) AND ( SIZEOF (USEDIN ( pds.context_relationship , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_OCCURRENCE_RELATIONSHIP.OCCURRENCE_USAGE' ) ) =0 ) ) AND (( schema_name + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF ( pds.context_relationship ) ) AND ( pds.context_relationship.related_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name <> 'part occurrence' ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* product_definition_relationship | ( schema_name + '.ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_USAGE' IN TYPEOF ( pdr ) ) AND ( ( pdr.relating_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name <> 'part definition' ) OR ( pdr.related_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name <> 'part definition' ) ) AND ( ( pdr.relating_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name <>'physical occurrence' ) OR ( pdr.related_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name <>'physical occurrence' ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( pdr <* product_definition_relationship | (pdr.name = 'physical realization') AND ((pdr.relating_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name <> 'part definition') OR (pdr.related_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name <> 'physical occurrence')) )) = 0

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( pdr <* product_definition_relationship | (pdr.name = 'physical occurrence usage') AND (NOT(schema_name + '.ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_USAGE' IN TYPEOF(pdr)) OR (pdr.relating_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name <> 'physical occurrence') OR (pdr.related_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name <> 'physical occurrence')) )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( df <* document_file | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( df ,schema_name + '.PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' )| pd.name = 'document property' ) ) >1 ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( df <* document_file | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rt<* df.representation_types | ( schema_name + '.DOCUMENT_REPRESENTATION_TYPE' IN TYPEOF ( rt ) ) AND ( rt.name IN ['digital' , 'physical'] ) ) ) =0 ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* product_definition | (pd.frame_of_reference.name IN ['physical document definition', 'digital document definition' ,'physical model occurrence' ] ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd1 <* USEDIN ( pd , schema_name + '.PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' )| pd1.name = 'document property' ) ) >1 ) ) ) =0

rule.name: restrict_representation_for_document_content_property

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_content_representations | ( ( SIZEOF ( r.items ) <1 ) OR ( SIZEOF ( r.items ) >3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ri <* representation_item | ( SIZEOF (QUERY ( r <* USEDIN ( ri , schema_name + '.REPRESENTATION.ITEMS' ) | r.name ='document content' ) ) >0 ) AND NOT ( ri. name IN ['detail level' , 'geometry type' , 'real world scale' ] ) )) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_content_representations | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* r.items |( it.name = 'detail level' ) AND ( schema_name + '.DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) ) ) >1) ) ) =0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_content_representations | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* r.items | ( it.name = 'geometry type' ) AND ( schema_name + '.DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) ) ) >1 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_content_representations | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* r.items |( it.name = 'real world scale' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( [schema_name + '.MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , schema_name + '.VALUE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM']* TYPEOF( it ) ) =1 ) ) ) >1 ) ) ) =0

rule.name: restrict_representation_for_document_creation_property

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_creation_representations | ( ( SIZEOF ( r.items ) <1 ) OR (SIZEOF ( r.items ) >3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ri <* representation_item | ( SIZEOF (QUERY ( r <* USEDIN ( ri ,schema_name + '.REPRESENTATION.ITEMS' ) | r.name ='document creation' ) ) >0 ) AND NOT ( ri. name IN [ 'creating interface' , 'creating system' ,'operating system' ] ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_creation_representations | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* r.items | ( i.name = 'creating interface' ) AND ( schema_name + '.DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( i )))) >1 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_creation_representations | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* r.items | ( i.name = 'creating system' ) AND ( schema_name + '.DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( i )))) <>1 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_creation_representations | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* r.items | ( i.name = 'operating system' ) AND ( schema_name + '.DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( i )))) >1) ) ) =0

rule.name: restrict_representation_for_document_format_property

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_format_representations | ( ( SIZEOF ( r.items ) <1 ) OR (SIZEOF ( r.items ) >3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ri <* representation_item | ( SIZEOF (QUERY ( r <* USEDIN ( ri ,schema_name + '.REPRESENTATION.ITEMS' ) | r.name ='document format' ) ) >0 ) AND NOT ( ri. name IN ['character code' , 'data format' ] ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_format_representations | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* r.items | (i.name = 'character code' ) AND ( schema_name + '.DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( i ) ) ) ) >1) ) ) =0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_format_representations | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* r.items | (i.name = 'data format' ) AND ( schema_name + '.DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( i ) ) ) ) >1) ) ) =0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_format_representations | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* r.items| ( i.name = 'size format' ) AND ( schema_name + '.PLANAR_EXTENT' IN TYPEOF ( i ) ) ) ) >1 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* property_definition | ( pd. name ='document property' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN( pd , schema_name + '.PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION') | NOT ( pdr.used_representation.name IN ['document content' , 'document creation' , 'document format' , 'document size' ] ) ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* representation | ( r.name IN [ 'document content' , 'document creation' , 'document format' , 'document size' ] ) AND ( SIZEOF (QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( r , schema_name + '.PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.USED_REPRESENTATION') | ( schema_name + '.PROPERTY_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF( pdr. definition ) ) AND ( pdr. definition.name = 'document property' ) ) ) =0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* representation | ( r.name IN ['document content' , 'document creation' , 'document format' , 'document size' ] ) AND (r.context_of_items.context_type<> 'document parameters' )) ) =0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rc <* representation_context | ( rc.context_type = 'document parameters' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY( r <* USEDIN ( rc ,schema_name + '.REPRESENTATION.CONTEXT_OF_ITEMS' ) | NOT( r.name IN [ 'document content' , 'document creation' , 'document format' , 'document size' ] ) ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

rule.name: restrict_representation_for_document_size_property

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_size_representations | ( ( SIZEOF ( r.items ) <1 ) OR (SIZEOF ( r.items ) >2 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ri <* representation_item | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* USEDIN ( ri ,schema_name + '.REPRESENTATION.ITEMS' ) | r.name ='document size' ) ) >0 ) AND NOT ( ri. name IN ['file size' , 'page count' ] ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_size_representations| ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* r.items | (i.name = 'file size' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( [schema_name + '.MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , schema_name + '.VALUE_RANGE' , schema_name + '.VALUE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM']* TYPEOF ( i ) ) =1 ) ) ) >1 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* document_size_representations | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* r.items | ( i.name = 'page count' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( [schema_name + '.MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , schema_name + '.VALUE_RANGE' , schema_name + '.VALUE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM']* TYPEOF ( i ) ) =1 ) ) ) >1 )) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* applied_identification_assignment| NOT at_most_one_version_id (ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* class | NOT at_most_one_version_id (ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* configuration_item | NOT at_most_one_version_id (ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* document_file | NOT at_most_one_version_id (ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* effectivity | NOT at_most_one_version_id (ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* general_property | NOT at_most_one_version_id (ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* product_concept | NOT at_most_one_version_id (ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* product_concept_feature | NOT at_most_one_version_id (ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* shape_representation | NOT at_most_one_version_id (ent) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sc <* security_classification | SIZEOF (USEDIN ( sc , schema_name + '.SECURITY_CLASSIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_SECURITY_CLASSIFICATION' ) ) =0 ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( co <* characterized_object | NOT ( type_check_function ( co , [schema_name + '.CHARACTERIZED_CLASS' , schema_name + '.DOCUMENT_FILE' , schema_name + '.FEATURE_COMPONENT_DEFINITION' , schema_name + '.FEATURE_DEFINITION' , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_CLASS' , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_IDENTIFICATION'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ca <* classification_assignment | NOT ( type_check_function ( ca , [schema_name + '.APPLIED_CLASSIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT' , schema_name + '.LANGUAGE_ASSIGNMENT'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( cri <* compound_representation_item | NOT ( type_check_function ( cri , [schema_name + '.DEFAULT_TOLERANCE_TABLE_CELL' , schema_name + '.VALUE_RANGE'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( dr <* document_reference | NOT ( type_check_function ( dr , [schema_name + '.APPLIED_DOCUMENT_REFERENCE' , schema_name + '.DRAUGHTING_SPECIFICATION_REFERENCE'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( e <* effectivity | NOT ( type_check_function ( e , [schema_name + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_EFFECTIVITY' , schema_name + '.TIME_INTERVAL_BASED_EFFECTIVITY'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ea <* effectivity_assignment | NOT ( type_check_function ( ea , [schema_name + '.APPLIED_EFFECTIVITY_ASSIGNMENT' , schema_name + '.APPLIED_INEFFECTIVITY_ASSIGNMENT' , schema_name + '.CONFIGURED_EFFECTIVITY_ASSIGNMENT'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( eca <* effectivity_context_assignment | NOT ( type_check_function ( eca , [schema_name + '.CLASS_USAGE_EFFECTIVITY_CONTEXT_ASSIGNMENT' , schema_name + '.CONFIGURED_EFFECTIVITY_CONTEXT_ASSIGNMENT'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( edi <* externally_defined_item | NOT ( type_check_function ( edi , [schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_CHARACTER_GLYPH' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_CLASS' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_CURVE_FONT' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_FEATURE_DEFINITION' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_GENERAL_PROPERTY', schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_HATCH_STYLE' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_STYLE' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_SYMBOL' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_TEXT_FONT' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_TILE_STYLE'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( g <* group | NOT ( type_check_function ( g , [schema_name + '.CLASS' , schema_name + '.CLASS_SYSTEM' , schema_name + '.LANGUAGE' , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_CONCEPT_FEATURE_CATEGORY' , schema_name + '.REP_ITEM_GROUP'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ga <* group_assignment | NOT ( type_check_function ( ga , [schema_name + '.APPLIED_GROUP_ASSIGNMENT' , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_CONCEPT_FEATURE_CATEGORY_USAGE'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ia <* identification_assignment | NOT ( type_check_function ( ia , [schema_name + '.APPLIED_IDENTIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT' , schema_name + '.EXTERNAL_IDENTIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* property_definition | NOT ( type_check_function ( pd , [schema_name + '.MATERIAL_PROPERTY' , schema_name + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_SHAPE'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* property_definition_representation| NOT ( type_check_function ( pdr , [schema_name + '.MATERIAL_PROPERTY_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.SHAPE_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION'] ,3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY (r <* representation | NOT (type_check_function(r, [schema_name + '.CONSTRUCTIVE_GEOMETRY_REPRESENTATION', schema_name + '.CONTACT_RATIO_REPRESENTATION', schema_name + '.DEFAULT_TOLERANCE_TABLE', schema_name + '.DEFINITIONAL_REPRESENTATION', schema_name + '.DIRECTION_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION', schema_name + '.HARDNESS_REPRESENTATION', schema_name + '.MOMENTS_OF_INERTIA_REPRESENTATION', schema_name + '.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION', schema_name + '.SURFACE_TEXTURE_REPRESENTATION', schema_name + '.TACTILE_APPEARANCE_REPRESENTATION', schema_name + '.TEXT_STRING_REPRESENTATION', schema_name + '.VISUAL_APPEARANCE_REPRESENTATION'] , 3 ) ))) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ri <* representation_item | NOT ( type_check_function ( ri , [schema_name + '.COMPOUND_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , schema_name + '.MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , schema_name + '.REP_ITEM_GROUP' , schema_name + '.VALUE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( a <* address | NOT ( type_check_function( a , [schema_name + '.ORGANIZATIONAL_ADDRESS' , schema_name + '.PERSONAL_ADDRESS'] , 0 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ci <* configurable_item | NOT ( type_check_function ( ci , [schema_name + '.PRODUCT_SPECIFICATION'] , 0 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( dpa <* document_product_association | NOT ( type_check_function ( dpa , [schema_name + '.DOCUMENT_PRODUCT_EQUIVALENCE'] , 0 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( edi <* externally_defined_item | NOT ( type_check_function ( edi , [schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_CHARACTER_GLYPH' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_CLASS' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_CURVE_FONT' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_FEATURE_DEFINITION' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_GENERAL_PROPERTY', schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_HATCH_STYLE' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_STYLE' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_SYMBOL' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_TEXT_FONT' , schema_name + '.EXTERNALLY_DEFINED_TILE_STYLE'] , 0 ) ) ) ) =0

function.name: at_most_one_class_system
at_most_one_version_id
item_correlation
allowed_translations
